title: The Stardust Path
text: In a galaxy where stars whispered secrets, one hamster dared to listen...
author: StarryWriter

title: Cursed Scrolls of Glowkeep
text: Every midnight, the ancient scroll opened itself, revealing a new truth — or a new curse.
author: MysticQuill

title: Tales from the Tech Jungle
text: In a digital rainforest, ByteTeller uncovered the lost code of the Ancients.

title: Grind of the Forgotten Mage
text: Banished from the tower, the InkMage carved new spells using only $GRIND and willpower.

title: The Whisker Protocol
text: FableFox’s fur twitched. Something was off. The Hamnet had been breached again...
author: FableFox
